original_text: So when the fight started, the soldiers that were with Saul and Jonathan did not have any swords or spears. Only Saul and his son Jonathan had them.
korean_text: 싸우는 날에 사울과 요나단과 함께 한 백성의 손에는 칼이나 창이 없고 오직 사울과 그의 아들 요나단에게만 있었더라

sentences.original_text: the soldiers that were with Saul and Jonathan
did not have any swords or spears.
Only Saul and his son Jonathan had them.
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 사울과 그의 아들 요나단만이 그것들을 가지고 있었습니다.
